metadata.title: CVE-2020-12114 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description:
A pivot_root race condition in fs/namespace.c in the Linux kernel 4.4.xbefore 4.4.221, 4.9.x before 4.9.221, 4.14.x before 4.14.178, 4.19.x before4.19.119, and 5.x before 5.3 allows local users to cause a denial ofservice (panic) by corrupting a mountpoint reference counter.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-12114` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-4.15.0-106-generic - 4.15.0-106.107
linux-image-4.15.0-106-generic-lpae - 4.15.0-106.107
linux-image-4.15.0-106-lowlatency - 4.15.0-106.107
linux-image-unsigned-4.15.0-106-generic - 4.15.0-106.107
linux-image-unsigned-4.15.0-106-lowlatency - 4.15.0-106.107
No subscription required

linux-image-5.3.0-59-generic - 5.3.0-59.53~18.04.1
linux-image-5.3.0-59-generic-lpae - 5.3.0-59.53~18.04.1
